wsoauth-extensionname:
{{name}}
The name of the extension (typically WSOAuth).
wsoauth-auth-providers-desc: The description of the configuration parameter that defines the list of custom OAuth providers.
wsoauth-auto-populate-groups-desc: The description of the configuration parameter that defines the list of MediaWiki groups that get automatically assigned to the user after they are authenticated.
wsoauth-authentication-failure: Message shown to the user when the authentication failed or when they are not authorised for this wiki.
wsoauth-invalid-username: Message shown to the user when the OAuth provider returns an invalid username.
wsoauth-unknown-auth-provider-class-exce: Exception message shown when the auth provider class was not loaded or found.
wsoauth-unknown-auth-provider-exception-: Exception message shown when the auth provider was not found.
wsoauth-invalid-auth-provider-class-exce: Exception message shown when the auth provider class does not implement AuthProvider.
wsoauth-initiate-login-failure: Message shown to the user when the communication to the OAuth-provider could not be initialised.
wsoauth-migrate-users-by-username-desc: The description of the configuration parameter that defines whether ot not to allow account usurpation by username.
wsoauth-not-configured-message: Message shown to the user if the wiki is not configured for remote login.
wsoauth-disallow-remote-only-accounts-de: The description of the configuration parameter that defines whether or not to allow remote accounts without a local counterpart.
wsoauth-already-logged-in-through-remote: Message shown to the user if they are already logged in through a remote or migrated account.
wsoauth-remote-only-accounts-disabled: Message shown to the user if remote-only login has been disabled on this wiki.
wsoauth-prefs-manage-remote: Key shown on 'Basic information' section on Special:Preferences.
wsoauth-missing-uri: Exception message shown when no remote URI is configured.
wsoauth-missing-client-id: Exception message shown when no client ID is configured.
wsoauth-missing-client-secret: Exception  message shown when no client secret is configured.
wsoauth-manage-remotes: Button shown on Special:Preferences to manage your remote accounts.
wsoauth-use-real-name-as-username-desc: The description of the configuration parameter that defines whether to use the real name as the username.
wsoauth-could-not-create-mapping: Exception message shown when a mapping could not be created for various reasons.
wsoauth-login-button-label-wikipedia: Login button text for Wikimedia login (branded as "Wikipedia").
wsoauth-login-button-label-wikimedia: Login button text for Wikimedia login (branded as "Wikimedia").
wsoauth-login-button-label-facebook: Login button text for Facebook login.
